Reviews.Title: Completely faded in less than 1 month
Reviews.Author: dowza13
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money.  The quality is a joke. The sun and rain will fade this in less than 30 days.

Reviews.Title: Easy to read & post
Reviews.Author: Douknowme
Reviews.Content: I had two other Camera & Audio recording signs that faded over the last three years. I read the reviews and purchased them. In order to stop any potential fading I wrapped them with a see through tight plastic. I needed the two language versions and these fit the need

Reviews.Title: easy fix
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline  Ann  Glenn
Reviews.Content: If you want them to last a long time just laminate them. You can get 8.5"x11" self laminating sheets at Walmart or Kmart they just barely fit but it works great

Reviews.Title: Warning signs
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: These are nice as they have bilingual warnings and we are in great need of this. Our theft rate has risen quite a bit, as we are being overrun by non english speaking people.

Reviews.Title: They are fading.
Reviews.Author: linda sider
Reviews.Content: The signs are fading in the sun and rain.  Understood they were for outside.  Not much good if someone cannot read them.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised
Reviews.Author: Randall Crum
Reviews.Content: Great product.  I use these at my vacation rentals where I have security cameras.  So far, no break ins. I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Fade Quickly!
Reviews.Author: Ship Fedex! "The World On Time!"
Reviews.Content: These stickers fade within just a few weeks if exposed to sunlight. Hav'nt used the signs yet so not sure about them.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: gdgardner
Reviews.Content: wht cheap crap. my 13 year old could hav printed better. its not a sign its sticky paper with 1990 printer lines

Reviews.Title: Signs get mildew quickly, stickers fade in sunlight
Reviews.Author: J. Degraaf "Amatuer Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: I bought these because the price was right; however, the signs get mildew on them quickly when kept outside. The stickers, if placed in any sort of direct or filtered light, fade extremely fast (within 5 weeks the red was basically gone). Would likely be good for indoors and better for low sunlight areas.

Reviews.Title: VERY POOR QUALITY
Reviews.Author: Patrick "Hawkbl8"
Reviews.Content: i WAS RATHER DISAPPOINTED IN THESE SIGNS AFTER THEY HAD BEEN UP FOR A SHORT TIME THEY FADED IN THE SUN.

Reviews.Title: The labels faded..
Reviews.Author: CK from LA
Reviews.Content: It took about one week amd the labels faded. Another week and they stopped sticking. Waste of money. Do not buy it

Reviews.Title: Not so Good
Reviews.Author: Thomas I. Garcia
Reviews.Content: A little disappointed in these signs.  Obviously, I wanted them to post outside.  I have only had them out for a short while and they are already fading with exposure to the sun and the elements.  The maker should consider putting a better protective coating on these signs so that they can withstand the elements and last longer.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: El Malo
Reviews.Content: The small stickers bleached out by the sun even in the shade. The large stickers is more like a sign. Looks ok but a bit too big. Thanks for bringing good deals on line.

Reviews.Title: Very bad odor
Reviews.Author: BOCAGIRL
Reviews.Content: Definitely could not keep these in my house when I opened the envelope as they have that IMPORTED stink!  I will cover with laminate as suggested so they do not fade from the sun and post outside.

ProductInfo.Features:
Large ones size: 11.5"x8.3"
Small ones size: 3"x2"
This is the quick, easy way to warn criminals that they are being watched
Easily posted and removed
Can be applied to any smooth surface
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 3 large & 3 small security warning signs/stickers/Decals for CCTV video surveillance camera 1RV
